name: ReportCustomMetrics
description:
Report metrics from non-native Customer.io channels.

Use this tool to report metrics from channels not supported natively by Customer.io or those not using their SDKs. It is useful for tracking user interactions like clicks or conversions using the CIO-Delivery-ID as a UTM parameter.

parameters.name: custom_metrics_data
parameters.description: JSON object containing metrics data to report, including any relevant tracking identifiers like CIO-Delivery-ID.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Customer.io Track API
